023
024package org.opt4j.core.genotype;
025
026import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
027import java.util.ArrayList;
028import java.util.Collection;
029import java.util.Collections;
030import java.util.Random;
031
032import org.opt4j.core.Genotype;
033
034/**
035 * <p>
036 * The {@link PermutationGenotype} can be used as a {@link Genotype}. The order
037 * of these elements is to be optimized.
038 * </p>
039 * <p>
040 * Example problem: Select the order of five balls ball<sub>1</sub>,
041 * ball<sub>2</sub>, ball<sub>3</sub>, ball<sub>4</sub>, ball<sub>5</sub><br/>
042 * Example usage: <blockquote>
043 * 
044 * <pre>
045 * PermutationGenotype&lt;Ball&gt; genotype = new PermutationGenotype&lt;Ball&gt;(Arrays.asList(ball1, ball2, ball3, ball4, ball5));
046 * genotype.init(new Random());
047 * </pre>
048 * 
049 * </blockquote> Example instance: [ball5, ball2, ball1, ball3, ball4]<br/>
050 * Example search space size: 5!
051 * </p>
052 * 
053 * @param <E>
054 *            the type of elements
055 * @author lukasiewycz
056 * 
057 */
058@SuppressWarnings("serial")
059public class PermutationGenotype<E> extends ArrayList<E> implements ListGenotype<E> {
060
061        /**
062         * Constructs a {@link PermutationGenotype}.
063         */
064        public PermutationGenotype() {
065                super();
066        }
067
068        /**
069         * Constructs a {@link PermutationGenotype}.
070         * 
071         * @param values
072         *            the initial values
073         */
074        public PermutationGenotype(Collection<E> values) {
075                super(values);
076        }
077
078        /*
079         * (non-Javadoc)
080         * 
081         * @see org.opt4j.core.Genotype#newInstance()
082         */
083        @Override
084        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
085        public <G extends Genotype> G newInstance() {
086                try {
087                        return (G) this.getClass().getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance();
088                } catch (InstantiationException e) {
089                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
090                } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {
091                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
092                } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
093                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
094                } catch (InvocationTargetException e) {
095                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
096                } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {
097                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
098                } catch (SecurityException e) {
099                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
100                }
101        }
102
103        /**
104         * Randomizes this genotype by a random permutation.
105         * 
106         * @param random
107         *            the random number generator
108         */
109        public void init(Random random) {
110                Collections.shuffle(this, random);
111        }
112}
